artist: Artist: Mac McGill , et al.; Author: Mumia Abu-Jamal , et al.; Editor: Susan Willmarth , et al.
creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Saddle stitched binding, text and reproduction of a painting of a winged and halo'd foot floating over a barren landscape; 96 pp.
medium: Color and black-and-white offset lithography; bound volume
title: World War 3 Illustrated #25: freaks, cults, saints, and revelations
